Key.Original: Do you wish to discard your unsaved changes?
Key.English: Do you wish to discard your unsaved changes?

Key.Original:
Are you sure you want to revert your settings to the default values?
This action is irreversible.
Key.English:
Are you sure you want to revert your settings to the default values?
This action is irreversible.

Key.Original: The character(s) required at the start of your message to use a chat command
Key.English: The character(s) required at the start of your message to use a chat command

Key.Original: After reaching the maximum value, the oldest message will be removed to allow for a new message to be added. Larger values can cause a decrease in performance.
Key.English: After reaching the maximum value, the oldest message will be removed to allow for a new message to be added. Larger values can cause a decrease in performance.

Key.Original: After reaching the maximum value, the oldest message will fade out to make room for the new message. Larger values may result in unexpected UI behaviour.
Key.English: After reaching the maximum value, the oldest message will fade out to make room for the new message. Larger values may result in unexpected UI behaviour.

Key.Original: The maximum duration of time a message will be visible in the feed. Once a message exceeds the TTL value it will fade out.
Key.English: The maximum duration of time a message will be visible in the feed. Once a message exceeds the TTL value it will fade out.

Key.Original: Press this key to autocomplete the first item in the suggestion list.
Key.English: Press this key to autocomplete the first item in the suggestion list.

Key.Original: Press any key to set it as your new autocomplete keybind.
Key.English: Press any key to set it as your new autocomplete keybind.

Key.Original: Press this key to show/hide the chat feed.
Key.English: Press this key to show/hide the chat feed.

Key.Original: Press any key to set it as your new show/hide chat feed keybind.
Key.English: Press any key to set it as your new show/hide chat feed keybind.

Key.Original: Auto-hide chat feed in streamer mode
Key.English: Auto-hide chat feed in streamer mode

Key.Original: Automatically hide the chat feed when joining a mission if stream friendly ui is enabled.
Key.English: Automatically hide the chat feed when joining a mission if stream friendly ui is enabled.

Key.Original: The font type used on text in the message feed.
Key.English: The font type used on text in the message feed.

Key.Original: The font size used on text in the message feed.
Key.English: The font size used on text in the message feed.

Key.Original: The font color used on text in the message feed.
Key.English: The font color used on text in the message feed.

Key.Original: The background color of messages in the message feed.
Key.English: The background color of messages in the message feed.

Key.Original: The font color used on mentions in the message feed.
Key.English: The font color used on mentions in the message feed.

Key.Original: The background color of messages in the message feed when you are mentioned.
Key.English: The background color of messages in the message feed when you are mentioned.

Key.Original: Show player connected logs in the message feed.
Key.English: Show player connected logs in the message feed.

Key.Original: Show player disconnected logs in the message feed.
Key.English: Show player disconnected logs in the message feed.

Key.Original: Show BattlEye kick and ban logs in the message feed.
Key.English: Show BattlEye kick and ban logs in the message feed.

Key.Original: Show death message logs in the message feed.
Key.English: Show death message logs in the message feed.

Key.Original: Show %1 messages in the message feed
Key.English: Show %1 messages in the message feed

Key.Original: Censor specified bad words and phrases in messages.
Key.English: Censor specified bad words and phrases in messages.

Key.Original: Add a new word or phrase to the language filter
Key.English: Add a new word or phrase to the language filter

Key.Original: Remove one or more words and phrases from the language filter
Key.English: Remove one or more words and phrases from the language filter

Key.Original: Remove one or more words and phrases
Key.English: Remove one or more words and phrases

Key.Original: Whitelist specific websites to be clickable in messages in the history viewer.
Key.English: Whitelist specific websites to be clickable in messages in the history viewer.

Key.Original: Add a new domain name to the website whitelist
Key.English: Add a new domain name to the website whitelist

Key.Original: Remove one or more domain names from the website whitelist
Key.English: Remove one or more domain names from the website whitelist

Key.Original: Mute players to block their messages from printing to the chat feed.
Key.English: Mute players to block their messages from printing to the chat feed.
